front.title: Network Service Header (NSH) Encapsulation for In Situ OAM (IOAM) Data

abstract.t: In situ Operations, Administration, and Maintenance (IOAM) is used for recording and collecting operational and telemetry information while the packet traverses a path between two points in the network. This document outlines how IOAM-Data-Fields are encapsulated with the Network Service Header (NSH).
